body.name: kingphenix Car Seat Cushion with 1.2inch Comfort Memory Foam, Seat Cushion for Car and Office Chair (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 9 mins
features: 【Comfortable Car Seat Cushion】The breathable fabric, polymer memory foam and non-slip silicone gel of this car seat cushion with right thickness help you to reduce the pressure on the coccyx.
【Protect Your Seat】This foam seat cushion for car not only makes your seat more comfortable, but also prevents dust, seat wear, creasing, scratches, etc., and provide better protection for your seat.
【Non-Slip Design】The silicone gel of this seat cushion adopts non-slip design to effectively fix the car seat cushion pad and will not slide around when getting in and out of the car.
【Wide Applicability】This portable memory foam car seat cushion is very easy to install and suitable for almost all kinds of seats at all seasons, including car, home, school, office seats, etc.
【After-Sales Service】You will get 100% customer support for this seat cushion. For the better shopping experience, if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us.
body.description: Why Choose the King phenix Car Seat Cushion? The Kingphenix memory foam car seat cushion is expertly crafted for drivers, office professionals, and anyone who spends extended periods sitting. We prioritize every detail of our car seat cushions, carefully selecting top-tier materials to ensure a premium and comfortable experience for all users. Perfect for enhancing your driving and sitting comfort, this cushion is a must-have for those seeking relief and support during long hours of sedentary work or travel. Exquisite Workmanship This seat cushion for car is tightly stitched, and the lines are full and smooth. Every detail show the exquisite workmanship and professional skills of kingphenix.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought a new car but the seats were less than comfortable. I bought one of these to see if it would help. I liked that they weren't thick and the price. After getting one, I knew I needed another. They fit great and feel wonderful. My only complaint is there aren't any instructions. There are two pieces sticking out that we have just assumed we are to shove in the seat. They don't stay fully but it isn't a huge deal we just adjust before sitting down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it comes small
reviews.reviewText: It came all rolled up and in like shrink-like packaging. We opened it and put on the seat of the truck we had. It was perfect! Soft strong and had attachments to hold it down to the seat. It was simple but exactly what we thought it was.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: the specs say this is 21"long x 19wide. i wish. it is actually 19 long by 19.5 wide. i tried it once so i have not used it very much. it seems to still fit ok and it is comfortable. some people complain about the thickness but that is correct. i didnt want too thick myself. well see how the foam holds up. i do wish it was longer as stated bc my seat is longer in a 20 durango. it comes up a little short in the front so i could use the extra support under my knees. the width is good which will give you some extra bolstering. this is just about the biggest one sold here i can find compared to other brands and similar models. in fact most are wider than longer which is not how car seats are made, so measure yours. the only thing i see that is longer are the full coverage faux leather bottom covers that go over the sides. those seem to have better sizes thus tempting to try, but i dont think they have much padding and are more protective covers than pads. ill prob stick with mine bc im not seeing anything longer but wanted to write the review bc the description is wrong. please make longer at 20.5-21"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very comfy seat, looks nice and appears to be durable. Grips the seat surface nicely to ensure there's no slippage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for price
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable and stays in place reasonably well although the product would be improved if there were sufficient elastic to attach the ''plum'' buckles to each other or to the seat. Worth what I paid for it andwould recommend it for car, office or other use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I expected it to be thicker. I wanted more height. It is well made and stays in place but it is not very supportive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of comfort in such a slim cushion
reviews.reviewText: We decided to give this cushion a try to add some comfort to a SecretLab Titan XL chair, which had an amazingly hard seat from day 1. Adding the cushion was simple and the anchors were perfect to keep it in place. The chair stands quite tall, so we wanted a slim cushion to avoid excess height. This fit the bill. We did not expect it to add as much comfort as it does. By all accounts, it feels like a completely different chair with the cushion in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adds comfort, but could be a bit thicker.
reviews.reviewText: This cushion definitely makes my bottom more comfortable, but it could be a bit thicker. Not bad.
useless for height, and plastic hold down could scratch seat cover. don't waist your money

reviews.reviewTitle: Need to add this to $70k SUV's
reviews.reviewText: So fed up with expensive vehicles having poor seats. Of all seat cushions tried, this one seems to be the best. No slip bottom side really works well. Despite being 'thin', it provides adequate cushioning. Appears to be quality made. Thought I'd try it....now will order another one.
Easy to fit looks good feels very comfortable
